67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c37.content: Free phone number validation API - 100k free requests / month.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c38.title: Volca
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c38.content: Free API providing lists of technologies such as programming languages and database systems. Unlimited free requests.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c39.title: Query.me

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c3a.title: ERD Lab
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c3a.content: Free cloud-based entity relationship diagram (ERD) tool made for developers.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c3b.title: What The Diff
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c3b.content: AI-powered code review assistant. The free plan has a limit of 25,000 monthly tokens (~10 PRs).

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c3c.title: Zipcodestack
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c3c.content: Free Zip Code API and Postal Code Validation. Ten thousand free requests/month.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c3d.title: OpenWeb Ninja
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c3d.content: Extremely comprehensive real-time SERP and public data APIs: Google Search, Shopping, Jobs, Images, Lens, News, Google Maps Businesses / Places, Reviews, Photos, Website Emails and Social Contacts Scraper, Amazon, Yelp and more. All APIs include a free tier with 100 to 200 free monthly requests.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c3e.title: Tavily AI
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c3e.content: API for online serach and rapid insights and comprehensive research, with the capability of organization of research results. 1000 request/month for the Free tier with No credit card required.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c3f.title: Composio
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c3f.content: Integration platform for AI Agents and LLMs. Integrate over 200+ tools across the agentic internet.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c40.title: WeatherXu
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c40.content: Global weather data including current conditions, hourly and daily forecasts, and weather alerts via our API. Integrating AI models and ML systems to analyze and combine multiple weather models to deliver improved forecast accuracy. Free tier includes 10,000 API calls/month.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c41.title: Zuplo
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c41.content: Free API Management platform to design, build, and deploy APIs to the Edge. Add API Key authentication, rate limiting, developer documentation and Monetization to any API in minutes. OpenAPI-native and fully-programmable with web standard apis & Typescript. The free plan offers up to 10 projects, unlimited production edge environments, 250 API keys, 100K monthly requests, and 1GB egress.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c42.title: Amazon SageMaker
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c42.content: A cloud-based ML platform with JupyterLab and terminal access. The free tier includes 8 hours of CPU (max 4 hours per session) or 4 hours of GPU per day.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c43.title: Artifactory

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c44.title: central.sonatype.org
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c44.content: The default artifact repository for Apache Maven, SBT, and other build systems.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c45.title: cloudrepo.io
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c45.content: Cloud-based, private and public, Maven and PyPi repositories. Free for open-source projects.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c46.title: cloudsmith.io
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c46.content: Simple, secure, and centralized repository service for Java/Maven, RedHat, Debian, Python, Ruby, Vagrant, and more. Free tier + free for open source.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c47.title: jitpack.io
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c47.content: Maven repository for JVM and Android projects on GitHub, free for public projects.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c48.title: packagecloud.io

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c4a.title: Gemfury

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c4b.title: paperspace
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c4b.content: Build & scale AI models, Develop, train, and deploy AI applications, free plan: public projects, 5Gb storage, basic instances.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c4c.title: RepoForge
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c4c.content: Private cloud-hosted repository for Python, Debian, NPM packages and Docker registries. Free plan for open source/public projects.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c4d.title: RepoFlow
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c4d.content: RepoFlow Simplifies package management with support for npm, PyPI, Docker, Go, Helm, and more. Try it for free with 10GB storage, 10GB bandwidth, 100 packages, and unlimited users in the cloud, or self-hosted for personal use only.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c4e.title: 3Cols
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c4e.content: A free cloud-based code snippet manager for personal and collaborative code.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c4f.title: Bitwarden
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c4f.content: The easiest and safest way for individuals, teams, and business organizations to store, share, and sync sensitive data.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c50.title: Braid

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c51.title: cally.com
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c51.content: Find the perfect time and date for a meeting. Simple to use, works great for small and large groups.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c53.title: Discord

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c55.title: Dubble
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c55.content: Free Step-by-Step Guide creator. Take screenshots, document processes and colloborate with your team. Also supports async screen recording.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c56.title: Duckly
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c56.content: Talk and collaborate in real time with your team. Pair programming with IDE, terminal sharing, voice, video, and screen sharing. Free for small teams.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c57.title: Dyte
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c57.content: The most developer-friendly live video & audio SDK, featuring collaborative plugins to enhance productivity and engagement. The free tier includes monthly 10,000 minutes of live video/audio usage.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c58.title: evernote.com
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c58.content: Tool for organizing information. Share your notes and work together with others

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c59.title: Fibery
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c59.content: Connected workspace platform. Free for single users, up to 2 GB disk space.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c5a.title: flock.com

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c5c.title: gokanban.io
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c5c.content: Syntax-based, no registration Kanban Board for fast use. Free with no limitations.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c5d.title: flat.social

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c5e.title: GitDailies

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c5f.title: gitter.im

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c60.title: Hackmd.io

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c61.title: hangouts.google.com
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c61.content: One place for all your conversations, for free, need a Google account

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c62.title: HeySpace

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c63.title: helplightning.com

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c64.title: ideascale.com
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c64.content: Allow clients to submit ideas and vote, free for 25 members in 1 community

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c65.title: Igloo
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c65.content: Internal portal for sharing documents, blogs, calendars, etc. Free for up to 10 users.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c6b.title: MarkUp

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c6d.title: Visual Debug
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c6d.content: A Visual feedback tool for better client-dev communication

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c6e.title: meet.jit.si
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c6e.content: One-click video conversations, and screen sharing, for free

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c70.content: Scalable, secure, cross-device, and enterprise-ready collaboration whiteboard for distributed teams. With a freemium plan.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c71.title: nootiz
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c71.content: The go-to tool for gathering and managing visual feedback on any website

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c73.title: Nuclino

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c78.title: Pumble

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c79.title: Raindrop.io

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c7b.title: Rocket.Chat
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c7b.content: Open-source communication platform with Omnichannel features, Matrix Federation, Bridge with others apps, Unlimited messaging, and Full messaging history.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c7c.title: seafile.com
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c7c.content: Private or cloud storage, file sharing, sync, discussions. The cloud version has just 1 GB

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c7d.title: Sema
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c7d.content: Free developer portfolio tool able to consolidate and snapshot contributions across multiple repositories into a single report.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c7e.content: Free screen sharing tool, share your screen with collabrators right from your browser, no download or registration needed. For free.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c7f.title: Slab
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c7f.content: A modern knowledge management service for teams. Free for up to 10 users.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c80.title: slack.com
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c80.content: Free for unlimited users with some feature limitations

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c81.title: Spectrum
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c81.content: Create public or private communities for free.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c82.title: StatusPile
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c82.content: A status page of status pages. Could you track the status pages of your upstream providers?

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c83.title: Stickies

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c84.title: Stacks

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c87.title: Teamplify
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c87.content: improve team development processes with Team Analytics and Smart Daily Standup. Includes full-featured Time Off management for remote-first teams. Free for small groups of up to 5 users.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c88.title: Tefter
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c88.content: Bookmarking app with a powerful Slack integration. Free for open-source teams.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c89.title: TeleType
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c89.content: share terminals, voice, code, whiteboard, and more. no sign-in is required for end-to-end encrypted collaboration for developers.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c8a.content: Free time tracking software for unlimited users. Easily integrates with PM tools like Jira, Trello, Asana, etc.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c8b.title: Huly
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c8b.content: All-in-One Project Management Platform (alternative to Linear, Jira, Slack, Notion, Motion) - unlimited users, 10GB storage per workspace, 10GB video(audio) traffic.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c8c.title: Teamcamp
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c8c.content: All-in-one project management application for software development companies.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c8d.title: twist.com
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c8d.content: An asynchronous-friendly team communication app where conversations stay organized and on-topic. Free and Unlimited plans are available. Discounts are provided for eligible teams.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c8e.title: tldraw.com

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c8f.title: BookmarkOS.com
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c8f.content: Free all-on-one bookmark manager, tab manager, and task manager in a customizable online desktop with folder collaboration.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c90.title: typetalk.com
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c90.content: Share and discuss ideas with your team through instant messaging on the web or your mobile

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c91.title: Tugboat
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c91.content: Preview every pull request, automated and on-demand. Free for all, complimentary Nano tier for non-profits.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c92.title: whereby.com
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c92.content: One-click video conversations, for free (formerly known as appear.in)

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c93.title: windmill.dev

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c94.title: vadoo.tv

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c95.title: userforge.com
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c95.content: Interconnected online personas, user stories and context mapping.  Helps keep design and dev in sync free for up to 3 personas and two collaborators.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c96.title: wistia.com
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c96.content: Video hosting with viewer analytics, HD video delivery, and marketing tools to help understand your visitors, 25 videos, and Wistia branded player

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c97.title: wormhol.org
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c97.content: Straightforward file sharing service. Share unlimited files up to 5GB with as many peers as you want.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c98.title: Wormhole

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c99.title: zoom.us
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c99.content: Secure Video and Web conferencing add-ons available. The free plan is limited to 40 minutes.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c9a.title: Zulip

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c9b.title: robocorp.com
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c9b.content: Open-source stack for powering Automation Ops. Try out Cloud features and implement simple automation for free. Robot work 240 min/month, 10 Assistant runs, Storage of 100 MB.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c9c.title: Fleep.io
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c9c.content: Fleep an alternative to Slack. It has a free plan for small teams with full message history, unlimited 1:1 conversations, 1 group conversation, and 1 GB file storage.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c9d.title: Chanty.com

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c9e.title: ruttl.com
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4c9e.content: The best all-in-one feedback tool to collect digital feedback and review websites, PDFs, and images.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ca0.title: Webvizio
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ca0.content: Website feedback tool, website review software, and bug reporting tool for streamlining web development collaboration on tasks directly on live websites and web apps, images, PDFs, and design files.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ca1.title: Pullflow
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ca1.content: Pullflow offers an AI-enhanced platform for code review collaboration across GitHub, Slack, and VS Code.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ca2.title: Webex

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ca3.title: RingCentral
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ca3.content: Video meetings with a free plan offering 50 minutes per meeting with 100 participants.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ca4.title: GitBook
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ca4.content: Platform for capturing and documenting technical knowledge — from product docs to internal knowledge bases and APIs. Free plan for individual developers.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ca5.title: transfernow
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ca5.content: simplest, fastest and safest interface to transfer and share files. Send photos, videos and other large files without a manditory subscription.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ca6.title: paste.sh
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ca6.content: This is a JavaScript and the Crypto based simple paste site.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ca7.title: Revolt.chat
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ca7.content: An OpenSource alternative for[Discord](https://discord.com/), that respects your privacy. It also have most proprietary features from discord for free. Revolt is a all in one application that is secure and fast, while being 100% free. every features are free. They also have (official & unofficial) plugins support unlike most main-stream chatting applications.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ca8.title: Tencent RTC
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ca8.content: Tencent Real-Time Communication (TRTC) offers solutions for group audio/video calls.10,000 free minutes/month for the first year.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ca9.title: Pastefy
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ca9.content: Beautiful and simple Pastebin with optional Client-Encryption, Multitab-Pastes, an API, a highlighted Editor and more.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4caa.title: SiteDots
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4caa.content: Share feedback for website projects directly on your website, no emulation, canvas or workarounds. Completely functional free tier.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cab.title: acquia.com
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cab.content: Hosting for Drupal sites. Free tier for developers. Free development tools (such as Acquia Dev Desktop) are also available.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cac.title: Contentful
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cac.content: Headless CMS. Content management and delivery APIs in the cloud. Comes with one free Community space that includes five users, 25K records, 48 Content Types, 2 locales.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cad.title: Cosmic
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cad.content: Headless CMS and API toolkit. Free personal plans for developers.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cae.title: Crystallize
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cae.content: Headless PIM with ecommerce support. Built-in GraphQL API. The free version includes unlimited users, 1000 catalog items, 5 GB/month bandwidth, and 25k/month API calls.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4caf.title: DatoCMS
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4caf.content: Offers free tier for small projects. DatoCMS is a GraphQL-based CMS. On the lower tier, you have 100k/month calls.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cb0.title: Directus
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cb0.content: Headless CMS. A completely free and open-source platform for managing assets and database content on-prem or in the Cloud. There are no limitations or paywalls.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cb1.title: FrontAid
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cb1.content: Headless CMS that stores JSON content directly in your Git repository. No restrictions.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cb2.title: kontent.ai
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cb2.content: A Content-as-a-Service platform that gives you all the headless CMS benefits while empowering marketers at the same time. The developer plan provides two users with unlimited projects with two environments for each, 500 content items, two languages with Delivery and Management API, and Custom elements support. You can use more detailed plans to meet your needs.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cb3.title: Prismic
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cb3.content: Headless CMS. Content management interface with fully hosted and scalable API. The Community Plan provides unlimited API calls, documents, custom types, assets, and locales to one user. Everything that you need for your next project. Bigger free plans are available for Open Content/Open Source projects.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cb4.title: Sanity.io
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cb4.content: Platform for structured content with an open-source editing environment and a real-time hosted data store. Unlimited projects. Unlimited admin users, three non-admin users, two datasets, 500K API CDN requests, 10GB bandwidth, and 5GB assets included for free per project.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cb5.title: sensenet
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cb5.content: API-first headless CMS providing enterprise-grade solutions for businesses of all sizes. The Developer plan provides three users, 500 content items, three built-in roles, 25+5 content types, fully accessible REST API, document preview generation, and Office Online editing.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cb6.title: TinaCMS
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cb6.content: Replacing Forestry.io. Open source Git-backed headless CMS that supports Markdown, MDX, and JSON. The basic offer is free with two users available.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cb7.title: GatsbyjsCMS
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cb7.content: Gatsby is the fast and flexible framework that makes building websites with any CMS, API, or database fun again. Build and deploy headless websites that drive more traffic, convert better, and earn more revenue!

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cb8.title: Hygraph
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cb8.content: Offers free tier for small projects. GraphQL first API. Move away from legacy solutions to the GraphQL native Headless CMS - and deliver omnichannel content API first.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cb9.title: Squidex
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cb9.content: Offers free tier for small projects. API / GraphQL first. Open source and based on event sourcing (versing every change automatically).

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cba.title: InstaWP
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cba.content: Launch a WordPress site in a few seconds. A free tier with 5 Active Sites, 500 MB Space, 48 hrs Site Expiry.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cbb.title: Storyblok
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cbb.content: A Headless CMS for developers and marketers that works with all modern frameworks. The Community (free) tier offers Management API, Visual Editor, ten sources, Custom Field Types, Internationalization (unlimited languages/locales), Asset Manager (up to 2500 assets), Image Optimizing Service, Search Query, Webhook + 250GB Traffic/month included.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cbc.title: WPJack
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cbc.content: Set up WordPress on any cloud in less than 5 minutes! The free tier includes 1 server, 2 sites, free SSL certificates, and unlimited cron jobs. No time limits or expirations—your website, your way.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cbd.title: Appinvento
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cbd.content: AppInvento is a free No code app builder. In the automatically generated backend code, users have complete access to the source code and unlimited APIs and routes, allowing for extensive integration. The free plan includes three projects, five tables, and a Google add-on.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cbe.title: Cody AI
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cbe.content: Cody is a coding AI assistant that uses AI and a deep understanding of your codebase to help you write and understand code faster. Cody gives developers a choice of LLMs (including local inference), has support for various IDEs, supports all popular programming languages, and has a free plan. The free plan gives developers 20 chat messages (using Claude 3 Sonnet as the LLM) and 500 autocompletions (using the Starcoder 16b) each month.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cbf.title: DhiWise
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cbf.content: Seamlessly turn Figma designs into dynamic Flutter & React applications with DhiWise's innovative code generation technology, optimizing your workflow and helping you craft exceptional mobile and web experiences faster than ever before.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cc0.title: Codeium
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cc0.content: Codeium is a free AI-powered code completion tool. It supports over 20+ programming languages (Python, JavaScript, Java, TypeScript, PHP, C/C++, Go, etc.) and integrates with all significant standalone and web IDEs.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cc1.title: Fern
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cc1.content: Write API definitions and use them to generate SDKs/client libraries in popular languages such as TypeScript, Python, Java, Go, and more. OpenAPI fully supported. Free tier generates code for up to a max of 20 endpoints.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cc2.title: Metalama
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cc2.content: Only for C#. Metalama generates the boilerplate of the code on the fly during compilation so that your source code remains clean. It is free for open-source projects, and its commercial-friendly free tier includes three aspects.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cc3.title: Supermaven
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cc3.content: Supermaven is a fast AI code completion plugin for VSCode, JetBrains, and Neovim. Free tier provides unlimited inline completions.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cc4.title: tabnine.com
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cc4.content: Tabnine helps developers create better software faster by providing insights learned from all the code in the world. Plugin available.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cc5.title: v0.dev
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cc5.content: v0 uses AI models to generate code based on simple text prompts. It generates copy-and-paste friendly React code based on shadcn/ui and Tailwind CSS that people can use in their projects. Each generation takes at minimum 30 credits. You start up with 1200 credits, and get 200 free credits every month.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cc6.title: beanstalkapp.com
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cc6.content: A complete workflow to write, review, and deploy code), a free account for one user, and one repository with 100 MB of storage

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cc7.title: browserling.com
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cc7.content: Live interactive cross-browser testing, free only 3 minutes sessions with MS IE 9 under Vista at 1024 x 768 resolution

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cc8.title: codacy.com
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cc8.content: Automated code reviews for PHP, Python, Ruby, Java, JavaScript, Scala, CSS, and CoffeeScript, free for unlimited public and private repositories

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cc9.title: Codeac.io
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cc9.content: Automated Infrastructure as Code review tool for DevOps integrates with GitHub, Bitbucket, and GitLab (even self-hosted). In addition to standard languages, it also analyzes Ansible, Terraform, CloudFormation, Kubernetes, and more. (open-source free)

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cca.title: CodeBeat
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cca.content: Automated Code Review Platform available for many languages. Free forever for public repositories with Slack and e-mail integration.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ccb.title: codeclimate.com
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ccb.content: Automated code review, free for Open Source and unlimited organisation-owned private repos (up to 4 collaborators). Also free for students and institutions.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ccc.title: codecov.io
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ccc.content: Code coverage tool (SaaS), free for Open Source and one free private repo

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ccd.title: CodeFactor
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ccd.content: Automated Code Review for Git. The free version includes unlimited users, public repositories, and one private repo.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cce.title: coderabbit.ai
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cce.content: AI-powered code review tool that integrates with GitHub/GitLab. Free tier includes 200 files/hour, 3 reviews per hour, and 50 conversations/hour. Free forever for open source projects.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ccf.title: codescene.io
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ccf.content: CodeScene prioritizes technical debt based on how the developers work with the code and visualizes organizational factors like team coupling and system mastery. Free for Open Source.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cd0.title: CodSpeed
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cd0.content: Automate performance tracking in your CI pipelines. Catch performance regressions before deployment, thanks to precise and consistent metrics. Free forever for Open Source projects.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cd1.title: coveralls.io
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cd1.content: Display test coverage reports, free for Open Source

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cd2.title: dareboost
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cd2.content: 5 free analysis reports for web performance, accessibility, and security each month

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cd3.title: deepcode.ai
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cd3.content: DeepCode finds bugs, security vulnerabilities, performance and API issues based on AI. DeepCode's speed of analysis allows us to analyze your code in real time and deliver results when you hit the save button in your IDE. Supported languages are Java, C/C++, JavaScript, Python, and TypeScript. Integrations with GitHub, BitBucket, and GitLab. Free for open source and private repos and up to 30 developers.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cd4.title: deepscan.io
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cd4.content: Advanced static analysis for automatically finding runtime errors in JavaScript code, free for Open Source

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cd5.title: DeepSource
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cd5.content: DeepSource continuously analyzes source code changes, finding and fixing issues categorized under security, performance, anti-patterns, bug-risks, documentation, and style. Native integration with GitHub, GitLab, and Bitbucket.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cd6.title: DiffText
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cd6.content: Instantly find the differences between two blocks of code. Completely free to use.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cd7.title: eversql.com
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cd7.content: EverSQL - The #1 platform for database optimization. Gain critical insights into your database and SQL queries automatically.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cd8.title: gerrithub.io
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cd8.content: Gerrit code review for GitHub repositories for free

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cda.title: goreportcard.com
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cda.content: Code Quality for Go projects, free for Open Source

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cdb.title: gtmetrix.com
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cdb.content: Reports and thorough recommendations to optimize websites

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cdc.title: holistic.dev
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cdc.content: The #1 static code analyzer for Postgresql optimization. Performance, security, and architect database issues automatic detection service

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cdd.title: houndci.com
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cdd.content: Comments on GitHub commits about code quality, free for Open Source

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cde.title: Moderne.io
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cde.content: Automatic source code refactoring. Moderne offers framework migrations, code analysis with remediation, and unrivaled code transformation at scale, so developers can spend their time building new things instead of maintaining the old. Free for Open Source.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cdf.title: reviewable.io
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cdf.content: Code review for GitHub repositories, free for public or personal repos.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ce0.title: parsers.dev
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ce0.content: Abstract syntax tree parsers and intermediate representation compilers as a service

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ce1.title: scan.coverity.com
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ce1.content: Static code analysis for Java, C/C++, C# and JavaScript, free for Open Source

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ce2.title: scrutinizer-ci.com
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ce2.content: Continuous inspection platform, free for Open Source

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ce3.title: semanticdiff.com
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ce3.content: Programming language aware diff for GitHub pull requests and commits, free for public repositories

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ce4.title: shields.io
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ce4.content: Quality metadata badges for open source projects

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ce5.title: sonarcloud.io
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ce5.content: Automated source code analysis for Java, JavaScript, C/C++, C#, VB.NET, PHP, Objective-C, Swift, Python, Groovy and even more languages, free for Open Source

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ce6.title: SourceLevel
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ce6.content: Automated Code Review and Team Analytics. Free for Open Source and organizations up to 5 collaborators.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ce7.title: webceo.com
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ce7.content: SEO tools but with also code verifications and different types of devices

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ce8.title: zoompf.com
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ce8.content: Fix the performance of your web sites, detailed analysis

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ce9.title: libraries.io
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ce9.content: Search and dependency update notifications for 32 different package managers, free for open source

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cea.title: Namae
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cea.content: Search various websites like GitHub, Gitlab, Heroku, Netlify, and many more for the availability of your project name.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ceb.title: searchcode.com
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ceb.content: Comprehensive text-based code search, free for Open Source

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cec.title: tickgit.com
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cec.content: Surfaces `TODO` comments (and other markers) to identify areas of code worth returning to for improvement.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ced.title: CodeKeep
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ced.content: Google Keep for Code Snippets. Organize, Discover, and share code snippets, featuring a powerful code screenshot tool with preset templates and a linking feature.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cee.title: AccessLint
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cee.content: AccessLint brings automated web accessibility testing into your development workflow. It's free for open source and education purposes.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cef.title: appcircle.io
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cef.content: An enterprise-grade mobile DevOps platform that automates the build, test, and publish store of mobile apps for faster, efficient release cycle. Free for 30 minutes max build time per build, 20 monthly builds and 1 concurrent build.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cf0.title: appveyor.com
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cf0.content: CD service for Windows, free for Open Source

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cf1.title: LocalOps
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cf1.content: Deploy your app on AWS/GCP/Azure in under 30 minutes. Setup standardised app environments on any cloud, which come with in-built continuous deployment automation and advanced observability. The free plan allows 1 user and 1 app environment.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cf2.title: Argonaut
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cf2.content: Deploy apps and infrastructure on your cloud in minutes. Support for custom and third-party app deployments on Kubernetes and Lambda environments. The free tier allows unlimited apps and deployments for 5 domains and 2 users.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cf3.title: bitrise.io
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cf3.content: A CI/CD for mobile apps, native or hybrid. With 200 free builds/month 10 min build time and two team members. OSS projects get 45 min build time, +1 concurrency and unlimited team size.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cf4.title: buddy.works
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cf4.content: A CI/CD with five free projects and one concurrent run (120 executions/month)

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cf6.title: bytebase.com
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cf6.content: Database CI/CD and DevOps. Free under 20 users and ten database instances

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cf7.title: CircleCI
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cf7.content: Comprehensive free plan with all features included in a hosted CI/CD service for GitHub, GitLab, and BitBucket repositories. Multiple resource classes, Docker, Windows, Mac OS, ARM executors, local runners, test splitting, Docker Layer Caching, and other advanced CI/CD features. Free for up to 6000 minutes/month execution time, unlimited collaborators, 30 parallel jobs in private projects, and up to 80,000 free build minutes for Open Source projects.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cfa.title: codefresh.io
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cfa.content: Free-for-Life plan: 1 build, one environment, shared servers, unlimited public repos

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cfc.title: codeship.com
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cfc.content: 100 private builds/month, five private projects, unlimited for Open Source

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cfd.title: deploybot.com
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cfd.content: 1 repository with ten deployments, free for Open Source

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cfe.title: deployhq.com
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cfe.content: 1 project with ten daily deployments (30 build minutes/month)

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cff.title: drone
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4cff.content: Drone Cloud enables developers to run Continuous Delivery pipelines across multiple architectures - including x86 and Arm (both 32-bit and 64-bit) - all in one place

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4d00.title: LayerCI
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4d00.content: CI for full stack projects. One full stack preview environment with 5GB memory & 3 CPUs.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4d01.title: semaphoreci.com
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4d01.content: Free for Open Source, 100 private builds per month

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4d02.title: Squash Labs
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4d02.content: creates a VM for each branch and makes your app available from a unique URL, Unlimited public & private repos, Up to 2 GB VM Sizes.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4d04.title: Mergify
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4d04.content: workflow automation and merge queue for GitHub — Free for public GitHub repositories

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4d05.title: Make
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4d05.content: The workflow automation tool lets you connect apps and automate workflows using UI. It supports many apps and the most popular APIs. Free for public GitHub repositories, and free tier with 100 Mb, 1000 Operations, and 15 minutes of minimum interval.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4d06.title: Spacelift
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4d06.content: Management platform for Infrastructure as Code. Free plan features: IaC collaboration, Terraform module registry, ChatOps integration, Continuous resource compliance with Open Policy Agent, SSO with SAML 2.0, and access to public worker pools: up to 200 minutes/month

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4d07.title: microtica.com
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4d07.content: Startup environments with ready-made infrastructure components, deploy apps on AWS for free, and support your production workloads. The free tier includes 1 Environment (on your AWS account), 2 Kubernetes Services, 100 build minutes per month, and 20 monthly deployments.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4d08.title: Nx Cloud
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4d08.content: Nx Cloud speeds up your monorepos on CI with features such as remote caching, distribution of tasks across machines and even automated splitting of your e2e test runs. It comes with a free plan for up to 30 contributors with generous 150k credits included.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4d09.title: blacksmith
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4d09.content: Managed performance runners for GitHub Actions that provides 3,000 free minutes per month, with no credit card needed.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4d0a.title: Terramate
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4d0a.content: Terramate is an orchestration and management platform for Infrastructure as Code (IaC) tools such as Terraform, OpenTofu, and Terragrunt. Free up to 2 users including all features.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4d0b.title: Terrateam
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4d0b.content: GitOps-first Terraform automation with pull request-driven workflows, project isolation via self-hosted runners, and layered runs for ordered operations. Free for up to 3 users.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4d0c.title: Applitools.com
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4d0c.content: Smart visual validation for web, native mobile and desktop apps. Integrates with almost all automation solutions (like Selenium and Karma) and remote runners (Sauce Labs, Browser Stack). free for open source. A free tier for a single user with limited checkpoints per week.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4d0d.title: Appetize
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4d0d.content: Test your Android & iOS apps on this Cloud Based Android Phone / Tablets emulator and iPhone/iPad simulators directly in your browser. The free tier includes two concurrent session with 30 minutes of usage per month. No limit on app size.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4d0e.title: Apptim
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4d0e.content: A mobile testing tool that enables people without performance engineering skills to evaluate an app's performance and user experience (UX). A desktop version using your own device is 100% FREE, with unlimited tests on both iOS and Android.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4d0f.title: Argos
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4d0f.content: Open Source visual testing for developers. Unlimitedprojects, with 5,000 screenshots per month. Free for open-source projects.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4d10.title: Bencher
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4d10.content: A continuous benchmarking tool suite to catch CI performance regressions. Free for all public projects.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4d11.title: browserstack.com
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4d11.content: Manual and automated browser testing, [free for Open Source](https://www.browserstack.com/open-source?ref=pricing)

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4d12.title: BugBug
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4d12.content: Lightweight test automation tool for web applications. It is easy to learn and doesn't require coding. You can run unlimited tests on your own computer for free. You also get cloud monitoring and CI/CD integration for an additional monthly fee.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4d13.title: Checkly
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4d13.content: Code-first synthetic monitoring for modern DevOps. Monitor your APIs and apps at a fraction of the price of legacy providers. Powered by a Monitoring as Code workflow and Playwright. Generous free tier for devs.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4d14.title: checkbot.io
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4d14.content: Browser extension that tests if your website follows 50+ SEO, speed and security best practices. Free tier for smaller websites.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4d15.title: CORS-Tester
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4d15.content: A free tool for developers and API testers to check if an API is CORS-enabled for a given domain and identify gaps. Get actionable insights.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4d16.title: cypress.io

Found a bug? You can copy the unique URL to your test to show your devs exactly how to reproduce the bug.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4d2f.content: Various free network and server tools.

Additionally, OpenRouter offers paid models for more advanced requirements, for instance Claude, OpenAI, Grok, Gemini, and Nova.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e14.title: deco.cx

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e18.title: flightcontrol.dev

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e19.title: gigalixir.com

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e1a.title: Glitch
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e1a.content: Free public hosting with code sharing and real-time collaboration features. The free plan has a 1000-hours/month limit.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e1b.title: Lade

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e1c.title: pipedream.com

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e1d.title: pythonanywhere.com

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e1e.title: ampt.dev

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e1f.title: Koyeb

Seamlessly run Docker containers, web apps, and APIs with git-based deployment, native autoscaling, a global edge network, and built-in service mesh and discovery. Free Instance lets you deploy a web service in Frankfurt, Germany or Washington, D.C., US. Free Managed Postgres database available in Frankfurt (Germany), Washington, D.C. (US), and Singapore. 512MB memory, 2GB storage, and 0.1 CPU. No credit card is required to get started.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e20.title: Napkin
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e20.content: FaaS with 500Mb of memory, a default timeout of 15 seconds, and 5,000 free API calls/month rate-limited to 5 calls/second.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e21.title: Meteor Cloud

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e22.title: Northflank

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e23.title: YepCode
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e23.content: All-in-one platform to connect APIs and services in a serverless environment. It brings all the agility and benefits of NoCode tools but with all the power of using programming languages. The free tier includes [1.000 yeps](https://yepcode.io/pricing/).

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e24.title: WunderGraph
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e24.content: An open-source platform that allows you to  quickly build, ship and manage modern APIs. Built-in CI/CD, GitHub integration, and automatic HTTPS. Up to 3 projects, 1GB egress, 300 minutes of build time per month on the [free plan](https://wundergraph.com/pricing)

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e25.title: Zeabur
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e25.content: Deploy your services with one click. Free for three services, with US$ 5 free credits per month.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e26.title: mogenius

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e2a.title: backendless.com

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e2f.title: darklang.com

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e48.title: IFTTT

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e4e.title: appsmith

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e4f.title: ToolJet

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e53.title: outsystems.com
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e53.content: Enterprise web development PaaS for on-premise or cloud, free "personal environment" offering allows for unlimited code and up to 1 GB database

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e55.title: Mendix

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e56.title: lil'bots

Great for building AI agents / internal tooling and sharing with team. Free-tier includes full access to APIs, AI coding assistant and 10,000 execution credits / month.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e57.title: Alwaysdata
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e57.content: 100 MB free web hosting with support for MySQL, PostgreSQL, CouchDB, MongoDB, PHP, Python, Ruby, Node.js, Elixir, Java, Deno, custom web servers, access via FTP, WebDAV and SSH; mailbox, mailing list and app installer included.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e58.title: Awardspace.com
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e58.content: Free web hosting + a free short domain, PHP, MySQL, App Installer, Email Sending & No Ads.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e59.title: Bohr
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e59.content: Free for non commercial projects + Developer-First Deployment and Development Platform that minimizes infrastructure hassle and speed up setup.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e5a.title: Bubble
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e5a.content: Visual programming to build web and mobile apps without code, free with Bubble branding.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e5b.title: dAppling Network
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e5b.content: Decentralized web hosting platform for Web3 frontends focusing on increasing uptime and security and providing an additional access point for users.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e5c.title: DigitalOcean
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e5c.content: Build and deploy three static sites for free on the App Platform Starter tier.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e5d.title: Drive To Web
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e5d.content: Host directly to the web from Google Drive & OneDrive. Static sites only. Free forever. One site per Google/Microsoft account.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e5e.content: A developer desktop app for hosting sites locally and sharing them publically (in real-time). Work however you like, using its beautiful user interface, API, and/or CLI.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e60.title: Free Hosting

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e61.title: Freehostia
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e61.content: FreeHostia offers free hosting services incl. an industry-best Control Panel & a 1-click installation of 50+ free apps. Instant setup. No forced ads.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e63.title: Kinsta Static Site Hosting
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e63.content: Deploy up to 100 static sites for free, custom domains with SSL, 100 GB monthly bandwidth, 260+ Cloudflare CDN locations.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e64.title: Lecturify
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e64.content: Web hosting with SFPT access for file upload and download, php available.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e65.title: Neocities
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e65.content: Static, 1 GB free storage with 200 GB Bandwidth.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e66.title: Netlify
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e66.content: Builds, deploys and hosts static site/app free for 100 GB data and 100 GB/month bandwidth.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e67.title: pantheon.io
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e67.content: Drupal and WordPress hosting, automated DevOps, and scalable infrastructure. Free for developers and agencies. No custom domain.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e68.title: readthedocs.org
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e68.content: Free documentation hosting with versioning, PDF generation, and more

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e6a.content: Find, Create, and Publish Open Source software for free

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e6b.title: surge.sh
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e6b.content: Static web publishing for Front-End developers. Unlimited sites with custom domain support

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e6d.title: tilda.cc
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e6d.content: One site, 50 pages, 50 MB storage, only the main pre-defined blocks among 170+ available, no fonts, no favicon, and no custom domain

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e6e.title: Vercel
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e6e.content: Build, deploy, and host web apps with free SSL, global CDN, and unique Preview URLs each time you `git push`. Perfect for Next.js and other Static Site Generators.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e6f.title: Versoly
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e6f.content: SaaS-focused website builder - unlimited websites, 70+ blocks, five templates, custom CSS, favicon, SEO and forms. No custom domain.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e70.title: Qoddi
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e70.content: PaaS service similar to Heroku with a developer-centric approach and all-inclusive features. Free tier for static assets, staging, and developer apps.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e71.title: FreeFlarum
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e71.content: Community-powered free Flarum hosting for up to 250 users (donate to remove the watermark from the footer).

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e72.title: fleek.co
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e72.content: Build modern sites and apps on the Open Web and its protocols seamlessly free for unlimited websites and 50 GB/month bandwidth.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e73.title: MDB GO
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e73.content: Free hosting for one project with two weeks Container TTL, 500 MB RAM per project, SFTP - 1G disk space.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e74.title: Patr Cloud
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e74.content: An easy-to-use cloud platform, among its paid services it offers to host three static sites for free.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e75.title: Serv00.com
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e75.content: 3 GB of free web hosting with daily backups (7 days). Support: Crontab jobs, SSH access, repositories (GIT, SVN, and Mercurial), support: MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, PHP, Node.js, Python, Ruby, Java, Perl, TCL/TK, Lua, Erlang, Rust, Pascal, C, C++, D, R, and many more.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e76.content: Free public DNS Resolver, which is fast and secure (encrypt your DNS query), provided by Cloudflare. Useful to bypass your internet provider's DNS blocking, prevent DNS query spying, and [to block adult & malware content](https://developers.cloudflare.com/1.1.1.1/1.1.1.1-for-families). It can also be used [via API](https://developers.cloudflare.com/1.1.1.1/encrypted-dns/dns-over-https/make-api-requests). Note: Just a DNS resolver, not a DNS hoster.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e77.title: 1984.is
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e77.content: Free DNS service with API and lots of other free DNS features included.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e78.title: cloudns.net
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e78.content: Free DNS hosting up to 1 domain with 50 records

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e79.title: deSEC
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e79.content: Free DNS hosting with API support, designed with security in mind. Runs on open-source software and is supported by [SSE](https://www.securesystems.de/).

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e7a.title: dns.he.net
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e7a.content: Free DNS hosting service with Dynamic DNS Support

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e7b.title: Zonomi
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e7b.content: Free DNS hosting service with instant DNS propagation. Free plan: 1 DNS zone (domain name) with up to 10 DNS records.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e7d.title: duckdns.org
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e7d.content: Free DDNS with up to 5 domains on the free tier. With configuration guides for various setups.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e7e.title: Dynv6.com
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e7e.content: Free DDNS service with [API support](https://dynv6.com/docs/apis) and management of a lot of dns record types (like CNAME, MX, SPF, SRV, TXT and others).

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e7f.title: freedns.afraid.org
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e7f.content: Free DNS hosting. Also, provide free subdomains based on numerous public user [contributed domains](https://freedns.afraid.org/domain/registry/). Get free subdomains from the "Subdomains" menu after signing up.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e80.title: luadns.com
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e80.content: Free DNS hosting, three domains, all features with reasonable limits

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e81.title: namecheap.com
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e81.content: Free DNS. No limit on the number of domains

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e83.title: noip.at
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e83.content: Free DDNS service without registration, tracking, logging or advertising. No limit to domains.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e84.title: noip
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e84.content: a dynamic DNS service that allows up to 3 hostnames free with confirmation every 30 days

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e85.title: sslip.io
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e85.content: Free DNS service that when queried with a hostname with an embedded IP address returns that IP address.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e87.title: zoneedit.com
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e87.content: Free DNS hosting with Dynamic DNS Support.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e88.title: zonewatcher.com
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e88.content: Automatic backups and DNS change monitoring. One domain free

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e8c.title: eu.org
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e8c.content: Free eu.org domain. The request is usually approved in 14 days.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e8f.title: 4EVERLAND
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e8f.content: Compatible with AWS S3 - APIs, interface operations, CLI, and other upload methods, upload and store files from the IPFS and Arweave networks in a safe, convenient, and efficient manner. Registered users can get 6 GB of IPFS storage and 300MB of Arweave storage for free. Any Arweave file uploads smaller than 150 KB are free.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e90.title: backblaze.com
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e90.content: Backblaze B2 cloud storage. Free 10 GB (Amazon S3-like) object storage for unlimited time

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e91.title: filebase.com
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e91.content: S3 Compatible Object Storage Powered by Blockchain. 5 GB free storage for an unlimited duration.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e92.title: Tebi
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e92.content: S3 compatibility object storage.Free 25 GB storage and 250GB outbound transfer.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e93.title: Idrive e2
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e93.content: S3 compatibility object storage. 10 GB free storage and 10 GB download bandwidth per month.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e94.title: C2 Object Storage
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e94.content: S3 compatibility object storage. 15 GB free storage and 15 GB downloads per month.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e95.title: Aiven
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e95.content: Aiven offers free PostgreSQL, MySQL and Redis plans on its open-source data platform. Single node, 1 CPU, 1GB RAM, and for PostgreSQL and MySQL, 5GB storage. Easy migration to more extensive plans or across clouds.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e96.title: airtable.com
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e96.content: Looks like a spreadsheet, but it's a relational database unlimited bases, 1,200 rows/base, and 1,000 API requests/month

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e97.title: Astra
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e97.content: Cloud Native Cassandra as a Service with [80GB free tier](https://www.datastax.com/products/datastax-astra/pricing)

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e98.title: codehooks.io
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e98.content: Easy to use JavaScript serverless API/backend and NoSQL database service with functions, Mongdb-ish queries, key/value lookups, a job system, realtime messages, worker queues, a powerful CLI and a web-based data manager. Free plan has 5GB storage and 60/API calls per minute. 2 developers included. No credit-card required.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e99.title: CrateDB
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e99.content: Distributed Open Source SQL database for real-time analytics. [Free Tier CRFREE](https://crate.io/lp-crfree): One-node with 2 CPUs, 2 GiB of memory, 8 GiB of storage. One cluster per organization, no payment method needed.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e9a.title: FaunaDB
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e9a.content: Serverless cloud database with native GraphQL, multi-model access, and daily free tiers up to 100 MB

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e9b.title: Upstash
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e9b.content: Serverless Redis with free tier up to 10,000 requests per day, 256MB max database size, and 20 concurrent connections

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e9d.title: redsmin.com
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e9d.content: Online real-time monitoring and administration service for Redis, Monitoring for 1 Redis instance free

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e9f.title: MemCachier
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4e9f.content: Managed Memcache service. Free for up to 25MB, 1 Proxy Server, and basic analytics

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ea0.title: scalingo.com
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ea0.content: Primarily a PaaS but offers a 128MB to 192MB free tier of MySQL, PostgreSQL, or MongoDB

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ea1.title: SeaTable
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ea1.content: Flexible, Spreadsheet-like Database built by the Seafile team. unlimited tables, 2,000 lines, 1-month versioning, up to 25 team members.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ea2.title: skyvia.com
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ea2.content: Cloud Data Platform offers a free tier and all plans are completely free while in beta

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ea3.title: StackBy
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ea3.content: One tool that combines spreadsheets' flexibility, databases' power, and built-in integrations with your favorite business apps. The free plan includes unlimited users, ten stacks, and a 2GB attachment per stack.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ea4.title: TiDB Cloud
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ea4.content: TiDB is an open-source MySQL-compatible distributed HTAP RDBMS. TiDB Serverless provides 5GB of row storage, 5GB of column storage, and 50 million Request Units (RUs) for free each month.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ea5.title: Turso by ChiselStrike
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ea5.content: Turso is SQLite Developer Experience in an Edge Database. Turso provides a Free Forever starter plan, 9 GB of total storage, Up to 500 databases, Up to 3 locations, 1 billion row reads per month, and Local development support with SQLite.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ea6.title: InfluxDB
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ea6.content: Timeseries database, free up to 3MB/5 minutes writes, 30MB/5 minutes reads and 10,000 cardinalities series

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ea7.title: restdb.io
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ea7.content: a fast and straightforward NoSQL cloud database service. With restdb.io you get schema, relations, automatic REST API (with MongoDB-like queries), and an efficient multi-user admin UI for working with data. The free plan allows 3 users, 2500 records, and 1 API request per second.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ea9.title: Neo4j Aura
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ea9.content: Managed native Graph DBMS / analytics platform with a Cypher query language and a REST API. Limits on graph size (50k nodes, 175k relationships).

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4eaa.title: Neon
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4eaa.content: Managed PostgreSQL, 0.5 GB of storage (total), 1 Project ,10 branches, Unlimited Databases, always-available primary branch ( Auto suspend after 5 minutes), 20 hours of Active time per month (total) for non-primary branch compute.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4eab.title: Dgraph Cloud
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4eab.content: Managed native Graph DBMS with a GraphQL API. Limited to 1 MB data transfer per day.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4eac.title: Tinybird
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4eac.content: A serverless managed ClickHouse with connection-less data ingest over HTTP and lets you publish SQL queries as managed HTTP APIs. There is no time limit on free-tier, 10GB storage + 1000 API requests per day.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ead.title: TigerGraph Cloud
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ead.content: Managed native Graph DBMS / analytics platform with a SQL-like graph query language and a REST API. One free instance with two vCPU, 8GB Memory, and 50GB storage that sleeps after 1 hour of inactivity.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4eae.title: TerminusCMS
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4eae.content: Managed free service for TerminusDB, a document and graph database written in Prolog and Rust. Free for dev, paid service for enterprise deployments and support.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4eaf.title: filess.io
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4eaf.content: filess.io is a platform where you can create two databases with up to 10 MB per database of the following DBMS for free: MySQL, MariaDB, MongoDB, and PostgreSQL.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4eb0.title: xata.io
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4eb0.content: Xata is a serverless database with built-in powerful search and analytics. One API, multiple type-safe client libraries, and optimized for your development workflow. The free-forever tier is sufficient for hobby developers which comes with three units of Xata, please refer to the website for unit definition.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4eb1.title: 8base.com
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4eb1.content: 8base is a full-stack low-code development platform built for JavaScript developers built on top of MySQL and GraphQL and serverless backend-as-a-service. It allows you to start building web applications quickly using a UI app builder and scale quickly, The Free tier includes rows: 2,500, Storage: 500, Serverless computing: 1Gb/h, and client app users: 5.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4eb2.title: Nile
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4eb2.content: A Postgres platform for B2B apps. Unlimited databases, Always available with no shutdown, 1GB of storage (total), 50 million query tokens, autoscaling, unlimited vector embeddings

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4eb3.title: Pinggy
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4eb3.content: Public URLs for localhost with a single command, no downloads required. HTTPS / TCP / TLS tunnels. The free plan has 60 minutes tunnel lifetime.
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4eb3.category: Tunneling, WebRTC, Web Socket Servers and Other Routers

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4eb4.title: conveyor.cloud
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4eb4.content: Visual Studio extension to expose IIS Express to the local network or over a tunnel to a public URL.
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4eb4.category: Tunneling, WebRTC, Web Socket Servers and Other Routers

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4eb5.title: Hamachi
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4eb5.content: LogMeIn Hamachi is a hosted VPN service that lets you securely extend LAN-like networks to distributed teams with a free plan that allows unlimited networks with up to 5 people
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4eb5.category: Tunneling, WebRTC, Web Socket Servers and Other Routers

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4eb6.title: Mirna Sockets
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4eb6.content: Free Socket as a Service Platform that gives you a wss:// URL when deploying your Web Socket Server code and also allows you to monitor its performance.
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4eb6.category: Tunneling, WebRTC, Web Socket Servers and Other Routers

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4eb7.title: localhost.run
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4eb7.content: Expose locally running servers over a tunnel to a public URL.
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4eb7.category: Tunneling, WebRTC, Web Socket Servers and Other Routers

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4eb8.title: localtunnel
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4eb8.content: Expose locally running servers over a tunnel to a public URL. Free hosted version, and [open source](https://github.com/localtunnel/localtunnel).
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4eb8.category: Tunneling, WebRTC, Web Socket Servers and Other Routers

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4eb9.title: ngrok.com
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4eb9.content: Expose locally running servers over a tunnel to a public URL.
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4eb9.category: Tunneling, WebRTC, Web Socket Servers and Other Routers

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4eba.title: cname.dev
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4eba.content: Free and secure dynamic reverse proxy service.
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4eba.category: Tunneling, WebRTC, Web Socket Servers and Other Routers

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ebb.title: serveo
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ebb.content: Expose local servers to the internet. No installation, no signup. Free subdomain, no limits.
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ebb.category: Tunneling, WebRTC, Web Socket Servers and Other Routers

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ebc.title: Radmin VPN
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ebc.content: Connect multiple computers together via a VPN-enabling LAN-like network. Unlimited peers. (Hamachi alternative)
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ebc.category: Tunneling, WebRTC, Web Socket Servers and Other Routers

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ebd.title: segment.com
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ebd.content: Hub to translate and route events to other third-party services. 100,000 events/month free
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ebd.category: Tunneling, WebRTC, Web Socket Servers and Other Routers

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ebe.title: Google STUN — [stun:stun.l.google.com:19302](stun:stun.l.google.com:19302)
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ebe.category: Tunneling, WebRTC, Web Socket Servers and Other Routers

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ebf.title: Twilio STUN — [stun:global.stun.twilio.com:3478?transport=udp](stun:global.stun.twilio.com:3478?transport=udp)
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ebf.category: Tunneling, WebRTC, Web Socket Servers and Other Routers

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ec0.content: Zero config VPN, using the open-source WireGuard protocol. Installs on MacOS, iOS, Windows, Linux, and Android devices. Free plan for personal use with 100 devices and three users.
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ec0.category: Tunneling, WebRTC, Web Socket Servers and Other Routers

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ec1.title: webhookrelay.com
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ec1.content: Manage, debug, fan-out, and proxy all your webhooks to public or internal (i.e. localhost) destinations. Also, expose servers running in a private network over a tunnel by getting a public HTTP endpoint (`https://yoursubdomain.webrelay.io <----> http://localhost:8080`).
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ec1.category: Tunneling, WebRTC, Web Socket Servers and Other Routers

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ec2.title: Hookdeck
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ec2.content: Develop, test, and monitor your webhooks from anywhere. 100K requests and 100K attempts per month with three days retention.
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ec2.category: Tunneling, WebRTC, Web Socket Servers and Other Routers

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ec3.title: Xirsys
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ec3.content: Unlimited STUN usage + 500 MB monthly TURN bandwidth, capped bandwidth, single geographic region.
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ec3.category: Tunneling, WebRTC, Web Socket Servers and Other Routers

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ec4.title: ZeroTier
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ec4.content: FOSS managed virtual Ethernet as a service. Unlimited end-to-end encrypted networks of 25 clients on the free plan. Clients for desktop/mobile/NA; web interface for configuration of custom routing rules and approval of new client nodes on private networks
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ec4.category: Tunneling, WebRTC, Web Socket Servers and Other Routers

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ec5.title: LocalXpose
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ec5.content: Reverse proxy that enables you to expose your localhost servers to the internet. The free plan has 15 minutes tunnel lifetime.
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ec5.category: Tunneling, WebRTC, Web Socket Servers and Other Routers

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ec6.title: Traefik-Hub
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ec6.content: Publish locally, running services over a tunnel to a public custom URL and secure them with access control. Free for 5 services in one cluster.
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ec6.category: Tunneling, WebRTC, Web Socket Servers and Other Routers

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ec7.title: Expose
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ec7.content: Expose local sites via secure tunnels. The free plan includes an EU Server, Random subdomains, and Single users.
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ec7.category: Tunneling, WebRTC, Web Socket Servers and Other Routers

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ec8.title: btunnel
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ec8.content: Expose localhost and local tcp server to the internet. Free plan includes file server, custom http request and response headers, basic auth protection and 1 hour tunnel timeout.
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ec8.category: Tunneling, WebRTC, Web Socket Servers and Other Routers

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ec9.title: acunote.com
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ec9.content: Free project management and SCRUM software for up to 5 team members

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4eca.title: asana.com
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4eca.content: Free for private project with collaborators

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ecb.title: Backlog
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ecb.content: Everything your team needs to release great projects in one platform. The free plan offers 1 Project with ten users & 100MB of storage.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ecc.title: Basecamp
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ecc.content: To-do lists, milestone management, forum-like messaging, file sharing, and time tracking. Up to 3 projects, 20 users, and 1GB of storage space.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ecd.title: bitrix24.com
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ecd.content: Intranet and project management tool. The free plan has 5GB for unlimited users.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ece.title: cacoo.com
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ece.content: Online real-time diagrams: flowchart, UML, network. Free max. 15 users/diagram, 25 sheets

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ecf.title: Chpokify
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ecf.content: Teams-based Planning Poker that saves time on sprint estimation. Free up to 5 users, free Jira integrations, unlimited video calls, unlimited teams, unlimited sessions.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ed0.title: clickup.com
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ed0.content: Project management. Free, premium version with cloud storage. Mobile applications and Git integrations are available.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ed1.title: Clockify
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ed1.content: Time tracker and timesheet app that lets you track work hours across projects. Unlimited users, free forever.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ed2.title: Cloudcraft
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ed2.content: Design a professional architecture diagram in minutes with the Cloudcraft visual designer, optimized for AWS with intelligent components that show live data too. Free plan has unlimited private diagrams for single user.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ed3.title: Codegiant
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ed3.content: Project Management with Repository hosting & CI/CD. Free Plan Offers Unlimited Repositories, Projects & Documents with 5 Team Members. 500 CI/CD minutes per month. 30000 Serverless Code Run minutes per month 1GB repository storage.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ed4.title: Confluence
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ed4.content: Atlassian's content collaboration tool is used to help teams collaborate and share knowledge efficiently. Free plan for up to 10 users.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ed5.title: contriber.com
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ed5.content: Customizable project management platform, free starter plan, five workspaces

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ed6.title: Crosswork
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ed6.content: Versatile project management platform. Free for up to 3 projects, unlimited users, 1 GB storage.

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ed7.title: diagrams.net
67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ed7.content: Online diagrams stored locally in Google Drive, OneDrive, or Dropbox. Free for all features and storage levels

67dd41e0fdcefe68e6cc4ed8.title: freedcamp.com
